sentences.english: With algebraic multi-grid method(AMG), linear system of equations are solved.
sentences.chinese: 利用代數多重網格法求解了這個線性代數方程組。

sentences.english: You do need to have very good linear algebra skills.
sentences.chinese: 你需要有很好的線性代數技能。

sentences.english: The reader is assumed to know calculus and a little linear algebra.
sentences.chinese: 假定讀者瞭解微積分和線性代數一點。

sentences.english: Linear algebra content is more abstract, logic is stronger.
sentences.chinese: 線性代數內容比較抽象，邏輯性比較強。

sentences.english: The discretized tri-diagonal linear algebraic equations are solved with ADI method.
sentences.chinese: 離散後的三對角線性代數方程組用ADI方法求解。
